error.runtimeUnsupported: Unsupported runtime: only Deno and Bun are supported.

setup.denoJsonParseFailed: Failed to fetch or parse deno.json: {url}
setup.usageStart: Start static server only (requires prior build)

dev.noOutput: [view dev] No output contents; ensure build produced output.

hmr.rootNotFound: [view] HMR: #root not found, falling back to full page reload
hmr.containerEmpty: [view] HMR: container still empty after refresh, falling back to full page reload
hmr.refreshFailed: [view] HMR refresh failed, falling back to full page reload

init.routerUndefined: [view] createRouter from @dreamer/view/router is undefined. Ensure @dreamer/view is installed and the build resolves the /router subpath (e.g. jsr:@dreamer/view@^1.0.0-beta.24/router).

template.viewConfigComment: View project config: read by dev / build / start. build.dev: dev only. build.prod: prod only.
template.viewConfigDevComment: Dev overrides: no minify, keep sourcemap for debugging
template.jsxDtsComment: JSX intrinsic element types for TSX type checking
template.mainComment: App entry: create router and mount root component
template.appComment: Root component (convention _app.tsx): use router.getCurrentRouteSignal() for current route, render Layout + page
template.layoutComment: Layout (convention _layout.tsx): top nav + main area, theme toggle
template.loadingComment: Route lazy-load placeholder (convention _loading.tsx). RoutePage uses default export (match) => VNode.
template.notFoundComment: 404 page (convention _404.tsx): used as path * notFound route
template.notFoundMessage: The path you requested does not exist.
template.homeComment: Home: welcome, counter demo and intro
template.homeIntro: This project was generated by view init. Edit src/views/home.tsx and src/views/about.tsx to get started.
template.vIfIntro: count ≤ 2 shows AAA, 3–5 shows BBB, else CCC; use getter for reactivity.
template.aboutIntro: @dreamer/view is a front-end view layer with reactivity, router, Store, Boundary, etc.
template.aboutItemRouter: Router: no-refresh navigation, guards, title sync
template.routerComment: Router instance and context: createAppRouter, RouterProvider, useRouter
template.routersComment1: Route table (auto-generated): path → component, dynamic import for code splitting
template.routersComment2: Do not edit manually; dev regenerates from src/views.

generate.tsNocheckComment: Auto-generated file; component is dynamic import, RouteConfig type compatibility handled at runtime.
